documentType: FBI 302 or law enforcement records request response
summary: This document is a response from CenturyLink to a legal demand from the FBI, providing records for a target date range from November 2002 to December 2006. It appears to be part of a law enforcement investigation, likely related to obtaining telecommunications records.

persons.name: Angela Ortiz
persons.context: She is the CenturyLink employee who signed the response letter to the FBI's legal demand for records.

events.title: Legal demand submitted to CenturyLink
events.description: The FBI submitted a legal demand to CenturyLink for records.

events.title: CenturyLink response to FBI
events.description: CenturyLink provided the information requested pursuant to the FBI's legal demand.

locations: 110 Rio Robles San Jose, CA (inferred from '110 Rio Robles San Jo')
keyFacts: The FBI submitted a legal demand to CenturyLink on May 16, 2019, for records.
CenturyLink responded on May 30, 2019, providing records for the date range November 2002 to December 2006.
The document indicates the investigation involved obtaining telecommunications records from a service provider.
The records were assigned to 'Coved Communications Legal Department' as the service provider.
The document provides a portal and contact information for future law enforcement requests to CenturyLink.
